price: እንደዚሁም « (እንዲገመግሙና ያለፉትን መጻሕፍት) አጥንተሃልም» እንዲሉ ለሚያውቁ ሕዝቦችም (ቁርኣንን) እንድናብራራው አንቀጾችን እንገልጻለን፡፡
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِيَقُولُواْ دَرَسۡتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُۥ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuṣarrifu al-āyāti waliyaqūlū darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin yaʿlamūna
translations: and that We (may) make it clear
